onset.Description: Time of the event measured from the start of the acquisition of the first volume in the corresponding imaging file, in seconds.

duration.Description: Duration of the event, in seconds.

trial_type.Description: Type of stimulus or trial event.

temperature.Description: Temperature of the heat stimulus in degrees Celsius.

reliabilityrun.Description: 1 is run is a reiability run with TE=40 across both days, 0 if not.

patch.Description: The patch on the left forearm that was stimulated, with 1 being closest to the wrist and 5 being closest to the elbow.

Levels.2: Patch second closest to the wrist (b)
Levels.4: Patch second closest to the elbow (d)

TE.Description: The echo time with which the respective run was measured. This differed between runs.

onset_scr.LongName: Onset time in scr trace file
onset_scr.Description: The time of each event as recorded in the scr file.

rating.LongName: Average intensity rating of heat pain stimulus across run
rating.Description: Participants rated stimulus intensity using VAS scale from 0 to 100, 0 marked no perception, 50 marked pain threshold, 100 marked unbearable pain
